次に解決法を見つけること 人生には必ず―

translation.en: multiple times in our life, extreme stress.
The difference in peoples' lives is not what we face,

translation.en: You're gonna burn in hell for this! You'll burn!
translation.ja: 貴様は地獄で焼かれるんだ

translation.en: This is Dr. Hayes. I'm calling about your daughter Clara.
translation.ja: 娘さんの担当医のヘイズです

translation.en: I've been trying you for around an hour now.
translation.ja: ずっとかけてましたよ

translation.en: She's fine. She's up, ready to go. She's wondering where you are. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 元気ですよあなたを待っています

translation.en: So am I, for that matter.
Tell her I'm on my way. I'll be there soon.
Okay, will do. I'll make sure she gets something to eat.
translation.ja: 分かりました食事を取らせます

translation.en: [Clara] They gave me red jello and ice cream.
translation.ja: ゼリーとアイスをくれたの

translation.en: When are we leaving? Do I have to stay in here?
translation.ja: いつ行くの？もう帰っていい？

translation.en: No, we don't. We're free to go now.
translation.ja: ええ　行きましょう

translation.en: [Katrina] Yeah. No, you're right, Mom, I should have called you right back, but I just didn't want to bother you.
translation.ja: すぐかけ直さなくて悪かったわ　母さん

translation.en: But we're hitting the road now, yeah.
translation.ja: でも今 出発するところよ

translation.en: No. Promise you, everything is all good.
translation.ja: 心配しないで　万事順調よ

translation.en: [Clara] What letter are we up to?
What letter were we up to?

translation.ja: 忘れたわ　クララが決めて

translation.en: Where do you think he's going, Mommy?
[Clara] Your turn, Mommy. We're up to I.

translation.ja: ママ　ねえ 早く
